definition: unnamed hero
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
hero/outstanding/excellent/(literary) flower/blossom
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: They are the unsung heroes of the Chinese economic miracle.
sentences.chinese: 他们是中国经济奇迹的无名英雄。

sentences.english: The unsung hero of this campaign.
sentences.chinese: 这次竞选中的无名英雄。

sentences.english: There towers aloft in the square the Monument of Unknown Heroes.
sentences.chinese: 广场上矗立着无名英雄纪念碑。

sentences.english: Owen would also like to thank this "unsung heroes" for their contribution.
sentences.chinese: 欧文也很感谢这两位“无名英雄”的捐献。

sentences.english: Soar like a love song that stutters, life long, unsung.
sentences.chinese: 人生路漫漫，无名英雄，再唱一曲饶舌的情歌吧。

sentences.english: White Hat hackers are the unsung heroes of the Information Age.
sentences.chinese: 红客是信息时代的无名英雄。

sentences.english: It is to these unsung heroes that World Blood Donor Day is dedicated.
sentences.chinese: 世界献血日就是为表彰这些无名英雄设立的。

sentences.english: Such people are the unsung heroes of the information revolution.
sentences.chinese: 这些人才是信息革命的无名英雄。

sentences.english: You are unsung heroes, is the world famous.
sentences.chinese: 您是无名英雄，又是教坛名师。

sentences.english: You are the unsung hero of so many deeds benefiting our citizenry.
sentences.chinese: 您是无名英雄，做了许多有助我们老百姓的事情。
